channel.title: Matthew Kwong Blog
channel.description: Personal perspectives on a broad range of topics.

item.title: Migrating from Zod to Valibot: A Comparative Experience
item.description: Learn about migrating from Zod to Valibot for form validation: smaller bundles, familiar APIs, but with room for documentation improvement.
item.author: contact@mwskwong.com (Matthew Kwong)

item.title: Mastering default styles and props customization in MUI
item.description: Master the customization of default styles & props of MUI components using MUI's theming system. Learn defaultProps & styleOverrides for efficiency.
item.author: contact@mwskwong.com (Matthew Kwong)

item.title: One extra step after configuring @svgr/webpack in TypeScript projects
item.description: Learn to fix SVG import issues in TypeScript with @svgr/webpack by creating a declaration file for accurate type handling.
item.author: contact@mwskwong.com (Matthew Kwong)

item.title: Enforcing coding style with @vercel/style-guide
item.description: Learn to enforce coding style with @vercel/style-guide. Uncover effective use of ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript for improved code quality and consistency.
item.author: contact@mwskwong.com (Matthew Kwong)

item.title: To SSR, or not to SSR
item.description: Dive into the intricacies of Server-Side Rendering (SSR) vs. Client-Side Rendering (CSR) in web development, exploring their advantages and trade-offs.
item.author: contact@mwskwong.com (Matthew Kwong)

item.title: When NOT to use shadcn/ui?
item.description: Discover when not to use shadcn/ui. Learn about alternative approaches for UI development. Make informed choices for your project's specific needs.
item.author: contact@mwskwong.com (Matthew Kwong)
